name: airbnb-prop-types
description: Custom React PropType validators that we use at Airbnb.

scripts.test: npm run build && npm run test:only
scripts.test:all: npm run test:only && npm run react:14 && npm run test:only && npm run react:15 && npm run test:only
scripts.prepublish: npm run clean && npm run build && safe-publish-latest
scripts.build: npm run clean && babel src --out-dir build
scripts.react:14: npm run react:clean && npm i react@0.14 react-dom@0.14 react-addons-test-utils@0.14
scripts.react:15: npm run react:clean && npm i react@15 react-dom@15 react-addons-test-utils@15

author: Jordan Harband <ljharb@gmail.com>
